Description.Text: The Radisson Edwardian Marlborough hotel is a 4 star deluxe hotel located in Bloomsbury, one of the most elegant parts of London. Set amidst fashionable Georgian Squares, imposing university buildings and the British Museum. This 173 bedroom Radisson Edwardian Marlborough hotel sets the standards the moment you arrive with its marble lobby, original art pieces and gilded carved chairs. Relax in the cool and light Glass bar and restaurant or enjoy a latte or cocktail in the contemporary Solutions bar as you watch the world go by. The hotel places its guests near most major business districts and leisure attractions, close to Oxford Street shopping, University Quarter, Fitzrovia and Charlotte Street, Covent Garden, Soho, Regents Park, Holborn and the Inns of Court, The City and a myriad of clubs, bars and music venues.
